name: SLG.GAMES
description: SLG.GAMES is a next-generation blockchain game infrastructure provider. Consisting of an industry grade SDK that simplifies blockchain integration, a publisher management dashboard, multiple blockchain native modules as well as security safeguards, SLG.GAMES attempts to lower technical threshold for developers, help web2/traditional game studio enter the space and thus enhance playability for gamers. $SLG token is the governance token of SLG.GAMES.
